grounding.title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
grounding.description: Use your senses to reconnect with the present moment
steps: Look around and name 5 things you can see
Touch and name 4 things you can feel
Listen and name 3 things you can hear
Identify 2 things you can smell
Name 1 thing you can taste

breathing.title: Box Breathing
breathing.description: 4-4-4-4 breathing pattern to calm your nervous system
steps: Breathe in for 4 counts
Hold your breath for 4 counts
Breathe out for 4 counts
Hold empty for 4 counts
Repeat 4 times

opposite_action.title: Opposite Action
opposite_action.description: Do the opposite of what your emotions urge you to do
steps: Identify your current emotion
Notice what action it's urging you to take
Consider: Is acting on this emotion effective right now?
If not, identify the opposite action
Take one small step toward the opposite action

cold_water.title: Cold Water Reset
cold_water.description: Use cold water to activate your dive response
steps: Fill a bowl with cold water (add ice if available)
Take a deep breath
Hold your breath and put your face in the water for 15-30 seconds
Or: Hold a bag of frozen peas on your face
Or: Splash cold water on your face several times

muscle_relaxation.title: Quick Body Scan
muscle_relaxation.description: Release tension through progressive muscle relaxation
steps: Clench your fists tight for 5 seconds
Release and notice the relaxation
Tighten your shoulders up to your ears
Release and let them drop
Continue with other muscle groups as needed
